pageContext.claim: “They gave it to Bloomberg, they gave it to I believe the Wall Street Journal and it was either a bad leak by somebody that didn't know, but probably they just made up the story, there was no leak. I -- in the long term, I'm not sure if my political friends would agree, but I think a lot of leaks aren't leaks, they're made up by the writers, they don't exist -- the leak.”
pageContext.analysis: The Wall Street Journal and Bloomberg do not make up news stories. The source appears to have been one of Trump's top aides on trade.
